channel.title: Verhaak Lab
channel.description: Verhaak Lab's research focus is the analysis of cancer genomics data to improve our understanding of cancer biology.

item.title: TCGA Low Grade Glioma Paper
item.description:
The TCGA lower grade glioma paper was published in the New England Journal today with critical contributions from our lab. Roel was cited on NBC news!

MD Anderson News Release

TCGA Network. Comprehensive, Integrative Genomic Analysis of Diffuse Lower-Grade Gliomas. N Engl J Med. 2015. PMID: 26061751 Full text article

item.title: Tumor evolution in glioblastoma
item.description:
Hoon and Siyuan are co-first authors of our Genome Research publication on tumor evolution in glioblastoma. Congratulations!

Kim H, Zheng S, …, Verhaak RG. Whole-genome and multisector exome sequencing of primary and post-treatment glioblastoma reveals patterns of tumor evolution. Genome Res. 2015. PMID: 25650244 Full text article

item.title: Welcome Samir Amin!
item.description: Through a lateral transfer from Lynda Chin’s lab, we welcome graduate student Samir Amin in our midst.

item.title: Welcome Summer Students!
item.description: Two undergraduate students have joined the lab for the summer. Welcome to Lexi Xuanyi Li from Notre Dame, and Fred Lang Jr. from Duke.

item.title: More commentaries
item.description:
More commentaries: Hoon and Roel published a Nature Genetics News & Views article on colorectal carcinoma and the tumor microenvironment.

Kim H, Verhaak RG. Transcriptional mimicry by tumor-associated stroma. Nat Genet. 2015. PMID: 25814306 Full text article

item.title: Preview commentary article on precision medicine in oncology
item.description:
A Preview commentary article on precision medicine in oncology was published in Cancer Cell, with first author Emmanuel.

Martinez-Ledesma E, de Groot JF, Verhaak RG. Seek and destroy: relating cancer drivers to therapies. Cancer Cell 2015. PMID: 25759016 Full text article

item.title: Finalist for the Robert M. Chamberlain Distinguished Mentor Award
item.description:
It was announced today that Roel is a finalist for the Robert M. Chamberlain Distinguished Mentor Award.

There are postdoc positions open in the lab, join us!

item.title: Congratulations to Kim Hoon!
item.description: In recognition of his excellent Genome Research publication, Kim Hoon was awarded the 2015 Caroline Ross Endowed Fellowship.

item.title: TCGA lower grade glioma annual meeting
item.description:
Roel represented the TCGA lower grade glioma working group at the annual Society for Neuro-Oncology (SNO) meeting in Miami,FL, Nov 13-16, which was well received.
